extendedInfo.description: ONLY works on Moto Droid, i1, or Milestone!  Supports froyo.A very simple flashlight app that uses your camera's flash.  No interface -- just an icon.FREE AND OPEN SOURCE.  No ads.  No background processes.Prolonged use of the camera's LED(s) has not been tested.  This program comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY.

reviews.comment: I use this app often to walk from car to house in the dark; generally an excellent penlight type of usefulness. Very dependable, easy, and adequate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works but needs a on/off switch. I find that if you go to camera it will shut it off. i1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: You push it, it turns on the flash leds, push it again, it turns them off. Sad it doesn\'t support the Atrix, I really miss this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works as stated,nice simple app. Motorola i1(1.5 cupcake)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best App I\'ve ever installed.
reviews.comment: No excess bells and whistles. It does what its supposed to without being overly complex
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like it but the update causes my screen to go and stay super bright whenever I use it now. Have to manually reset brightness. Please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best flash light app out there. I put the icon on my main home screen. Now, I always have a flash light next to me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple to the point works great on Motorola i1 no interface needed just simple on/off
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 4 stars just because it doesn\'t have a cool creative icon, but just what I was looking for. Works as a light switch for the led, just tap it and bam!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome SIMPLE app.! Does exactly what I wanted- uses the camera flash for a flashlight. Perfect on my DroidX.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perfect its an on off switch, brilliantly simple
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: more functional than some others that just use screen light but have to open camera app to switxh LED off
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Beautiful k.i.s.s. Keep it simple stupid. Cool app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: All I want a flashlight app to do is turn on the LEDs. This has no graphics at all, just an icon. Perfect!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: One-touch light from my camera\'s flash. Sweet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best light app ever!  I\'ve tried many others.
reviews.comment: Please update, doesn\'t work on droid 4.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is the only one that I found that works perfectly on my Motorola i1. Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perfect. Camera LED lights up for use as a flashlight. Just what I needed. (droid x)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No doubt the best one I\'ve seen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So simple yet so useful. Must have for any Droid with an LED on the back
reviews.author: A Google User
